price: On that Day, close friends will become enemies to one another, except the righteous,
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
